actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend Section 105 of Title 23, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Transportation to develop a formula for retroactive credit for funds already expended for highway construction projects which have received approval under the provisions under Title 23.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Transportation to develop a retroactive credit formula for highway projects initiated by State highway departments without Federal aid which meet specified criteria for Federal-aid highways.

titles.title: A bill to amend Section 105 of Title 23, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Transportation to develop a formula for retroactive credit for funds already expended for highway construction projects which have received approval under the provisions under Title 23.
